name: Dark burial
detailed_description:
The plot of the game tells us the story of a lookout who witnessed the advancing forces of darkness. The guard, armed with just one crossbow, decides to warn his comrades with the help of signal lights.

Dark burial is a 2D platformer with a side view, the task is to complete the level and light the signal fire. On the way to the hero's cherished goal, we are waiting for a lot of puzzles that can be solved with the help of your crossbow and arrows. A huge number of enemies and traps will not make you bored.

Features:
-12 challenging levels
-Pixel graphics
- gloomy soundtrack
Bosses
